en.title: Beijing & North (Jing-Jin-Ji)
en.subtitle: The Imperial Core: History & Culture
en.description: The Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei integration area allows seamless travel across three administrative regions. Perfect for deep dives into Chinese history.
entry_ports: Air: Beijing Capital (PEK), Beijing Daxing (PKX)
Air: Tianjin Binhai (TSN), Shijiazhuang Zhengding (SJW)
Sea/Rail: Tianjin Int'l Cruise Port, Qinhuangdao Port
rules: Seamless Travel: Move freely between Beijing, Tianjin, and Hebei (e.g., Beijing -> High-speed train to Tianjin -> Qinhuangdao).
Duration: 240 Hours (10 Days) is enough for the Great Wall, Forbidden City, and Chengde Mountain Resort.
Restriction: You cannot travel directly to Shanghai or Xi'an from here unless you have a visa or exit/re-enter.
en.itinerary_highlight: Beijing (4 days) + Tianjin (2 days) + Chengde/Qinhuangdao (3 days)

zh.title: 北京与北方 (京津冀)
zh.subtitle: 帝都核心：历史与文化
zh.description: 京津冀一体化政策允许在三个行政区内无缝旅行。深入体验中国历史的绝佳选择。
zh.allowed_cities: 北京, 天津, 河北省
entry_ports: 航空：北京首都 (PEK), 北京大兴 (PKX)
航空：天津滨海 (TSN), 石家庄正定 (SJW)
海港/铁路：天津国际邮轮母港, 秦皇岛港
rules: 无缝畅行：在北京、天津和河北之间自由移动（例如：北京 -> 高铁去天津 -> 秦皇岛）。
时长：240小时（10天）足以游览长城、故宫和承德避暑山庄。
限制：除非持有签证，否则不能直接前往上海或西安。
zh.itinerary_highlight: 北京 (4天) + 天津 (2天) + 承德/秦皇岛 (3天)

en.title: Shanghai & East (Jiang-Zhe-Hu)
en.subtitle: The Economic Engine: Modernity & Water Towns
en.description: The Yangtze River Delta. China's most developed region with the densest high-speed rail network. Ideal for mixing business with leisure.
entry_ports: Shanghai: Pudong (PVG), Hongqiao (SHA), Port of Shanghai
Jiangsu: Nanjing Lukou (NKG), Wuxi Shuofang (WUX)
Zhejiang: Hangzhou Xiaoshan (HGH), Ningbo Lishe (NGB)
rules: High-Speed Hub: The best region for train travel. Shanghai -> Suzhou -> Hangzhou loop is fully legal.
Open Jaw: You can enter via Shanghai and exit via Hangzhou to a third country.
en.itinerary_highlight: Shanghai (3 days) + Suzhou (2 days) + Hangzhou (3 days) + Wuzhen/Nanjing (2 days)

zh.title: 上海与华东 (江浙沪)
zh.subtitle: 经济引擎：现代与水乡
zh.description: 长三角地区。中国最发达的区域，高铁网络最密集。完美结合商务与休闲。
zh.allowed_cities: 上海, 江苏省, 浙江省
entry_ports: 上海：浦东 (PVG), 虹桥 (SHA), 上海港
江苏：南京禄口 (NKG), 无锡硕放 (WUX)
浙江：杭州萧山 (HGH), 宁波栎社 (NGB)
rules: 高铁枢纽：最适合高铁旅行的区域。上海 -> 苏州 -> 杭州闭环完全合法。
异地出境 (Open Jaw)：可以从上海入境，从杭州前往第三国出境。
zh.itinerary_highlight: 上海 (3天) + 苏州 (2天) + 杭州 (3天) + 乌镇/南京 (2天)

en.title: Guangdong & GBA
en.subtitle: The Southern Powerhouse: Food & Tech
en.description: Province-wide visa-free access in Guangdong, plus seamless links to Hong Kong and Macau.
entry_ports: Air: Guangzhou Baiyun (CAN), Shenzhen Bao'an (SZX), Jieyang Chaoshan (SWA)
Land/Sea: Shenzhen Shekou Port, Nansha Port, HK-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge
rules: Hong Kong/Macau Factor: HK/Macau are 'Third Regions'. USA -> Guangzhou -> Hong Kong is a valid transit route.
One Trip, Multiple Stops: Use HK as a springboard to explore Guangzhou, Shenzhen, and Foshan.
Warning: Once you enter HK/Macau, you have left the mainland visa-free zone.
en.itinerary_highlight: Guangzhou (Morning Tea) -> Shenzhen (Tech) -> Foshan (Kung Fu) -> Exit to HK

zh.title: 广东与大湾区
zh.subtitle: 南方动力：美食与科技
zh.description: 广东省全域免签，加上与香港、澳门的紧密连接。
entry_ports: 航空：广州白云 (CAN), 深圳宝安 (SZX), 揭阳潮汕 (SWA)
陆路/水路：深圳蛇口, 南沙港, 港珠澳大桥
rules: 港澳因素：香港/澳门被视为'第三地'。美国 -> 广州 -> 香港 是合法的过境路线。
一程多站：利用香港作为跳板，游览广州、深圳和佛山。
警告：一旦进入香港或澳门，即视为离开了大陆免签区。
zh.itinerary_highlight: 广州 (早茶) -> 深圳 (科技) -> 佛山 (功夫) -> 出境至香港

en.title: Chengdu & West
en.subtitle: Pandas, Spice & Highlands
en.description: The hub of Western China. Note that unlike the East, these regions are generally NOT interconnected for visa-free travel.
entry_ports: Chengdu Tianfu (TFU), Chengdu Shuangliu (CTU)
Chongqing Jiangbei (CKG)
Kunming Changshui (KMG)
rules: Not Interconnected: You typically cannot use one transit permit to travel between Chengdu and Kunming.
Stay Local: Stick to the 11 administrative cities around Chengdu for the full 240 hours.
Highlights: Pandas, Sanxingdui, Leshan Giant Buddha.

zh.title: 成都与西部
zh.subtitle: 熊猫、美食与高地
zh.description: 中国西部的枢纽。注意：与东部不同，这些免签区域通常不互通。
zh.allowed_cities: 四川 (成都及周边10市), 重庆, 云南 (昆明及周边8市)
entry_ports: 成都天府 (TFU), 成都双流 (CTU)
重庆江北 (CKG)
昆明长水 (KMG)
rules: 不互通：通常不能持同一张临时入境许可在成都和昆明之间旅行。
区域限制：须在成都市及周边11个行政区划内停留满240小时。
亮点：熊猫繁育基地, 三星堆, 乐山大佛。
zh.itinerary_highlight: 成都 (熊猫) -> 乐山 (大佛) -> 都江堰 -> 三星堆
